properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paapula rakshakudu Yesu Goppa devaadi devudu Yesu Krupatho kougalinche nanu Yesu Upakaari nannu cherche Yesu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gorrelaku goppa kaapari Yesu Doruku thannu vedaku vaari kesu Aaraadhikulaku parishuddudesu Niraashagalavaari mithru desu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naadu maarghambunaku velugu Yesu Naadu paadambulaku deepamu Yesu Naadu daahambunaku paanamu Yesu Naadu yajnaanambuku jnaanamu Yesu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naadu rogambulaku vaidyudu Yesu Naadu badhyathala vahinchu nesu Naaku ekaanthamulo thodu Yesu Naaku thene kante bahu theepi Yesu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naaku rakshakudu rakshana Yesu Naaku vimochakudu vimochanesu Naaku jeevambunu devudu Yesu Naaku neethi naadu velugu Yesu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naaku maadiri vembadincha Yesu Naaku mundu naduchu naayakudesu Naaku dukkhambulo aadaranesu Naaku kastambulo dhairyamu Yesu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naadu hrudayambuna yunna vaadu Yesu Naadu vruddhiki kaarakundu Yesu Naadu krungudalalo thodanundu Yesu Naadu sarva mandu nila sarva mesu{/lang-eng}
